text: José Isidro Guerrero Macías (31 May 1951 - 23 February 2022) was a Mexican Roman Catholic prelate. He was born in Sinaloa, Mexico. He became a priest in 1973. In 1997, he became the Bishop of Mexicali. Guerrero Macías died in Mexicali, Mexico from COVID-19 on 23 February 2022, aged 71.Fallece el obispo de Mexicali por COVID19 ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Mexican Roman Catholic bishops Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico Category:People from Sinaloa
title: José Isidro Guerrero Macías
